reviews.review_msg: so-so prof but he keeps the class awake.  he's prob in the wrong department... he should be teaching theatre or something.  sometimes a little disorganized (typos in notes) and talks about really random things....but generally a good prof.

This prof is so fine!!!Kind of a bad teacher cuz he cant really explain stuff well, but he is sooooooo nice and funny and sooooooo goodlooking. I'd retake a class with him just so that i can stare at him. Total eye candy ladies... take the class!

Prof. Guilbault was funny and made me laugh several times! But he is also knowledgeable and can communicate most concepts effectively to students. The material presented in class was, however, quite confusing, and almost everyone, me included, was lost up until the final exam!

A very funny, helpful and interesting prof. He made linguistics amusing and class was never boring. He is a fair teacher and he is dedicated. He can be a little unorganized and makes a lot of errors (on notes and tests) but he is still great. Would definitely takes courses taught byhim again.

I've never taken an linguistics course before, and I thought I'd hate it - not with Christian! He's extremely smart (naturally, he has a PhD..) funny (which makes linguistics more enjoyable) and his tests/marking are very fair. And yes..he's quite the hottie... :) :)

Any French student should take FREN 270 with this prof. He is one of the best profs I've ever had. He explains linguistic concepts clearly and his exams are based on class readings/notes. He really makes linguistics interesting. Oh, and girls, he is very good-looking =)
